abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of HACS is allowed.

data.tries: Number of times a zigbee transaction may be retried until success
data.event_success: Name of event that is fired when a service call succeeds
data.event_failed: Name of event that is fired when a service call fails
data.event_done: Name of event that is fired when a service call is done (success or failure)

user.description: These are default values that may be used when you do not set the corresponding parameter in a specific ZHA-TOOLKIT service call.
user.title: zha-toolkit
